name: Get a GRIP!
description:
Why did I create this?

GET A GRIP! is a spiritual successor to SCREW YOU, PHYSICS!

why did i make a sequel? Well the games are mechanically different, but they are both infuriating hard. Fight your way through 9 levels of pure torture, with weird physics, and difficult grapple hook  action

also the graphics suck because i'm only 14
